and correctly. Giving respectful and constructive feedback on both observations of deliveries 
and completed checklists are important components of coaching. To motivate others and give 
appropriate feedback, good communication is critical. Good coaches know how and when to 
listen, speak to others with respect and kindness, and communicate ideas clearly and simply.
